name: Mamaison Riverside Hotel Prague

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great time at this place!!
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The stuff was really nice and helpful. Even if they did not have our reservation when we arrived, we were allocated in a very nice room. It was not luxurious but cozy and with nice view to the river!
reviews.title: Excellent Stay!

reviews.text: The breakfast was nice but not rich for a SLH and the dinner that we had in our room was tasty and not very expensive.
reviews.title: So good for the price, I thought there was a catch...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The place is not in the middle of the noizy city, but still just 10 min walk to the old city..
reviews.title: A bit disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recommend this hotel to as many as possible who wants to have a nice short stay at Prague.
reviews.title: Really good!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only good thing I can say about Mamaison Riverside Prague is that it’s clean and has a nice river view.
reviews.title: Majorly disappointing

reviews.text: Beside of that:
reviews.title: Nice hotel but wouldn't stay there if I was paying full price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Staffs’ English is scratching basic, the hotel has no concierge and receptionists have no knowledge of the city (”I don’t drink coffee” was the answer we got when asking for a recommendation for our morning coffee...).
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel - Terrific New Years Eve!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - The tiny room is lacking basic contrivances, the hotel has no fitness center and we are still looking for the promised bathrobes.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Since the hotel had no late check out option, we ended up paying a full day rate for 7 hours use... (the hotel wasn’t in full capacity so they wouldn’t have lost a dime being a little bit more flexible).
reviews.title: Cant wait to go back!

reviews.text: We stayed at the Riverside at the end of February and could not be more pleased with our stay. We stayed in the Family Suite, which is a Riverview Suite and Standard room (with a view of the river as well, but smaller) connected with the door open. It was HUGE. We could have made it work in the Suite, but we loved the two bathrooms (excellent for families like ours: 4 yr old and 2 yr old). The staff was excellent and helped us travel via the trams and walking around. Its a great 20 minute walk up to Old Town, the Castle, everything that you need to see when visiting Prague. Go to the Black Rooster restaurant as they recommend, excellent taste of Czech cuisine. I could go on and on for this place, we loved it. If we return to Prague, this place is it!
reviews.title: Simply Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Receptionists the most helpful and courteous at all times we have ever found,, even greater when you arrive at 11.00pm. Hotel clean with some rooms with a balcony and great view to the castle and across the river to the Old Town. Beds are very comfortable, rooms well furnished , bathroom superb with robes, good soaps etc but no slippers.We had just one breakfast which is served in the windowless basement but with a live cam feed of the exterior played on one of the walls.Food was fine but hot buffet very limited....do not pay 20 euros for breakfast...we paid 15 and that was for convenience on day 1....walk for 5 mins on the hotel side of the river and at the next bridge turn left on a main road and you will see the Restaurace Savoy and buy the Savoy special for a super meal at a great price.
reviews.title: Most helpful reception staff, comfortable clean room
MaMaison Riverside Hotel Prague - not up to its reviews!
reviews.text: It is a good 20 mins to Charles Bridge walking but very pleasant, trams are frequent either side of the river and get some 24 hour tickets from the hotel for 3 crowns.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No dining room in the hotel, it has a small bar which doubles as a lounge but closes at 12.00. We had good value in a junior suite for £76 a night...there are lots of bargains to be had in Prague at present so do not book here for silly money...it is comfortable but you will find as good at present .
reviews.title: great hotel- highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Due to the abundant number of high reviews, we stayed at the hotel from 12th February with friends and my comments are in the context that this is a 5 star rated hotel..
reviews.title: A great hotel in Prague

likes.liked: — Great atmosphere and staff. Great breakfast.
likes.disliked: — Felt isolated from historic and commercial core.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My girlfriend & i stayed here for 4 nights in the middle of August.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

likes.liked: — Location (away from crowds!), bar, room, service
likes.disliked: — Breakfast room can get full and noisy (due to its small size)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Needless to say that the Riverside lived up to its excellent reviews and reputation.
reviews.title: Excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in was fast, friendly and effortless. The staff were really helpful & made us feel right at home.
reviews.title: loved the walk

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room (the riverside suite) was well appointed, spacious, airy and the bed was sooo comfortable (i rarely sleep well in any hotel, so this is a BIG compliment)
reviews.title: A real great experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bar next to the lobby is small, homely and serves quality alcohol. Perfect!
reviews.title: Don't trust this hotel

description: Uniquely located and boasting award-winning Art Nouveau-style design, the upscale Mamaison Boutique Hotel Riverside Prague provides ideal accommodation for both leisure and business travellers in the trendy Smichov district of Prague. Charming and sophisticated, Mamaison Hotel Riverside Prague enjoys close connections to the city’s business districts, the airport and its main cultural attractions. With elegant accommodation, views and top facilities, the hotel offers fantastic rates for city stays in stylish and historic surroundings, making it one of the most charming boutique hotels in Prague and number one for your Prague hotel reservation.
